channel.title: Azure on DocDock Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Azure on DocDock Documentation

item.title: Setting Up kubectl for AKS
item.description: If you haven’t already installed kubectl, you can do so with the following: # if you haven't already sinatlled `kubectl` for your system... az aks install-cli # Connect to your cluster az aks get-credentials--resource-group myGroup --name myAKSCluster

item.title: Logging Into Azure ACR
item.description: # first login with `az login` az acr login --name my-container-registry

item.title: Connecting To the Azure CLI
item.description: It’s as simple as: az login # opens a browser window for authentication
